socialroulette 0.1.0
  • Reference

Convert a list of sessions into a MDGP distance metric

sessions_to_distance.Rd

A session is a data.frame containing the columns id1, id2 and date

sessions_to_distance(current_frame, past_sessions)

Arguments

current_frame

The current frame
past_sessions

List of previous sessions

Examples

frame  <- tibble::tibble(id=sprintf("id%.2d", 1:5), date=as.Date("2021-04-27"))
sessions <- list("2021-04-14"=list(c("id02", "id03", "id04"), c("id05", "id01")),
                  "2021-04-21"=list(c("id05", "id03", "id04"), c("id02", "id01")))
socialroulette:::sessions_to_distance(frame, sessions)

#> # A tibble: 11 x 4
#>    id1   id2   date        dist
#>    <chr> <chr> <date>     <dbl>
#>  1 id01  id02  2021-04-27     6
#>  2 id01  id03  2021-04-27    20
#>  3 id01  id04  2021-04-27    20
#>  4 id01  id05  2021-04-27    13
#>  5 id02  id03  2021-04-27    13
#>  6 id02  id04  2021-04-27    13
#>  7 id02  id05  2021-04-27    20
#>  8 id03  id04  2021-04-27    13
#>  9 id03  id04  2021-04-27     6
#> 10 id03  id05  2021-04-27     6
#> 11 id04  id05  2021-04-27     6
